title: Create a migration workflow
description: Creates a migration workflow in the BigQuery Migration API. A migration workflow contains a list of subtasks that are executed to migrate a data warehouse to BigQuery.

objective.narrative: Developers create a migration workflow to orchestrate the subtasks involved in a database migration, such as translation and execution. This workflow acts as the container for the entire migration process.

regionTags.name: bigquerymigration_v2_migrationservice_migrationworkflow_create
regionTags.title: Create a migration workflow
regionTags.description: Creates a migration workflow in the BigQuery Migration API. A migration workflow contains a list of subtasks that are executed to migrate a data warehouse to BigQuery.
